content: four variants of knitted snowflakes that can decorate windows trees or the christmas table worked in the round on circular needles or four double-pointed needles first stitches are cast on with circle cast-on and then knitting continues according to the chart and description each variant is then knitted according to it s chart you can find a video tutorial for the pattern here youtube com/odd-row 1 the snowflakes are blocked at the end for this you can use a printout of the template on page 6 you can choose to stiffen the snowflakes as shown in the video 1 https //youtu be/5df-lwhg0jg you can knit in exactly the yarn you want the size will depend on the yarn choice you can therefore choose to knit in one of the material suggestions or just use them as inspiration note that the stated yarn quantities and measurements are guidelines **suggestion #1** **variants ** 1 2 3 4 **measurement ** diameter appr 4 10 10 14 cm **suggested needles ** circular needle or four double pointed needles 2 5mm **suggested materials ** marisa lang yarns 210m/50g shiny krea deluxe 95m/25g shimmery kit couture 100m/25g **yarn consumption ** appr 0 5 2 2 4 g **suggestion #2** **variants ** 1 2 3 4 **measurement ** diameter appr 7 15 15 21 cm **suggested needles ** circular needle or four double pointed needles 4mm **suggested materials ** snefnug camarose 110m/50g isager soft isager 125m/50g fivel rauma 100m/50g **yarn consumption ** appr 2 8 8 15 g
